metadata.synopsis: Dandi Thistlepetal, Refugee 10, thinks the camp is well organized.

0.speaker: Dandi Thistlepetal
0.text: Could be worse. I could still be hiding in a ditch while a squad of Absolutist goblins marches past.

1.speaker: Dandi Thistlepetal
1.text: To be fair, for a miserable collection of shabby hovels jam-packed with wretched refugees, this place isn't bad at all.
